title: File an Expense Report
description: A reporter has returned from an assignment and needs to file an expense report to be reimbursed for travel and food costs.

tasks.description: Gather all receipts from the trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: All physical and digital receipts are collected.

tasks.description: Open the company's expense reporting software and create a new report.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new expense report is started.

tasks.description: Enter each expense as a line item, attaching a digital copy of the corresponding receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: All expenses are logged with proper documentation.

tasks.description: Submit the completed report to the accounting department for approval and reimbursement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is submitted through the proper channels.
